DOC.brief_summary: Although domestic violence is recognized as major threat in pregnancy, there is no intervention has been developed or test to support women in India. To evaluate the effect of women's empowerment program administered to abused women in order to reduce domestic abuse, improving health status and safety behavior.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Women's Empowerment Program for Abused Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: at least 18 years of age, victims of intimate partner violence, and willing to participate women whose abuser was not their intimate partner or who were unable to consent
